body: Depends on #16 --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/toxcore/20)

comment_regular_data.body: Define "depends". Is it based on #16's branch, instead of master?
I see, I guess you meant "replaces".
I meant depends as in "is based on", but then I decided to drop the old one instead.

Reviewed 10 of 10 files at r1.
Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 1 unresolved discussion.

---

_[other/travis/toxcore-script, line 9 [r1]](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/20#-KOmsHGW3t56aUqnGmNc:-KOmsHGW3t56aUqnGmNd:b-itofr2) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/toxcore/blob/9247d8221b3b770eb74693342a2dc5b821606565/other/travis/toxcore-script#L9)):_

> ```
> ../apidsl/_build/apigen.native other/apidsl/toxav.in.h | $ASTYLE --options=other/astyle/astylerc > toxav/toxav.h
> # Check if the code is formatted according to the astyle configuration.
> $ASTYLE --options=other/astyle/astylerc tox*/*.[ch]
> ```

Just `tox*/*.[ch]`? There are, at very least,  also `other/*.[ch]` and `other/bootstrap_daemon/src/*.[ch]`.

---

_Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/20)_

<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

Although it's out of scope of this PR, I just want to remind that there was a discussion about changing [tox*_version_is_compatible()](https://github.com/irungentoo/toxcore/pull/1527) functions to use a macro, which might be an idea for a next PR someone makes.

---

Previously, nurupo wroteâ€¦ > Just `tox*/*.[ch]`? There are, at very least, also `other/*.[ch]` and `other/bootstrap_daemon/src/*.[ch]`. >
> I wanted to avoid a complex expression, but I've changed my mind. It's better we format everything we can. --- _Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/toxcore/20)_

It is indeed out of scope. This comment will get lost. You could instead open a ticket to keep track of the discussion.

commit.message:
Check code formatting on Travis.

We run astyle on Travis and check if there is a diff. The build terminates if
git finds a difference.
